10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Abi Qatadah, from his father that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"I stand in prayer, then I hear a child crying, so I make my prayer brief, because I do not want to cause hardship for his mother

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا عَلَى الإِمَامِ مِنَ التَّخْفِيفِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam should make the prayer short
